description: Test suite for the WebsiteKnowledgeBase component, including synchronous and asynchronous tests for loading websites into the knowledge base, and verifying agent interactions with the knowledge base.

methods.name: setup_vector_db
methods.description: Fixture to set up a temporary LanceDb instance for testing.

methods.name: test_website_knowledge_base_directory
methods.description: Test loading multiple websites into the knowledge base and querying via agent.

methods.name: test_website_knowledge_base_single_url
methods.description: Test loading a single website into the knowledge base and querying via agent.

methods.name: test_website_knowledge_base_async_directory
methods.description: Asynchronous test for loading multiple websites and querying.

methods.name: test_website_knowledge_base_async_single_url
methods.description: Asynchronous test for loading a single website and querying.
